title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Optimize for AWS with intelligent automation (AIM235)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过智能自动化优化 AWS (AIM235)
abstract: Ensure applications get what they need to perform across Kubernetes clusters and AWS services. This presentation is brought to you by IBM, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 确保应用程序在 Kubernetes 集群和 AWS 服务中获得所需的性能。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 IBM 为您呈现。
